Name: MyJapaneseTeacher
About the game: This is an early access version of an erotic visual novel with real-life Japanese learning. The plot of the game is built around your lessons with a charming teacher - Izumi Ishikawa. Each lesson with her is unique in its atmosphere, content, events and the mood of the teacher. Unlike many other games of this genre, here Izumi speaks with a real living voice, from a real teacher. She will talk about the culture, the peculiarities of the language, give homework, teach you real hieroglyphs and phrases. You will need to answer questions, enter a written text, and at the end of the class you will actually be able to speak Japanese. With all this, Izumi is a girl, sexy and young, and sometimes naive. She truly wants you to keep learning and doesn't mind motivating you in special ways. Which ones? It's up to you to decide. Learning languages ​​can be atmospheric and sensual, Izumi can prove it to you.
